title: Museum Visitor
creator_credit: Gosko, ZSM Film Produktion, Channel 2 (ZDF) West Germany and Konstantin Lopushansky
brief_description: A remarkable fable warning of ecological catastrophe. Max decides to visit a museum on the bottom of the seabed, one which can only be reached during the seven-day low tide. What he finds while he waits, however, is a place reserved for mutants, victims of an ecological catastrophe.
creator_credit_for_label: Gosko, ZSM Film Produktion, Channel 2 (ZDF) West Germany and Konstantin Lopushansky
